title: Hyphenation possibilities in indesign
content:
Hello,   
   
Someone told me there is a feature in Quark that lets you see the different possibilities of hyphenation in a word which are correct gramatically speaking. I've been looking for this in InDesign and couldn't find it. Does anyone have more information on this? Is there a plugin that does something similar?   
   
Thanks,   
Em
author: emilie

comments.content:
Found it, it's in Edit\>Dictionary, hyphenate :-)   
   
Cheers,   
Em
